name: purevenv-prompt
description: Customized ZSH prompt based on Pure by Sindre Sorhus, adding Python Virtualenv to the prompt

scripts.postinstall: dest=/usr/local/share/zsh/site-functions/; mkdir -p $dest && ln -sf "$PWD/purevenv.zsh" $dest/prompt_purevenv_setup && ln -sf "$PWD/async.zsh" $dest/async || echo 'Could not automagically symlink the prompt.'
